title: TOPSOIL
description: Just plain screened dirt. Great for filling holes and using under sod.

title: TRIPLE MIX
description: Topsoil with compost and sand. A good soil for container gardening and garden beds.

title: GRO‑MAX
description: Leaf & Yard compost, bark fines and peat moss. Great for flower gardens, shrubs and trees.

title: GRO‑TURF
description: Composted pine bark, leaf & yard compost, coconut coir and sand. The best soil for overseeding. Formulated for growth and thatch breakdown.

title: BLACK LOAM
description: Marshy black earth soil. Used for top dressing.

title: GARDEN DELUXE
description: Triple mix, black loam, peat moss and added compost. The BEST garden soil ever. No supplemental fertilizer is needed.

title: BLACK GOLD
description: Composted horse manure (that’s it!). A great soil amendment.

title: SOD SOIL
description: A screened blend of everything from clay to potting soil. Cheap and great for filling a large hole.
